health_potion.name: Health Potion
health_potion.description: A potion that restores a character's health points (HP).

mana_potion.name: Mana Potion
mana_potion.description: A potion that restores a character's magic points (MP) or other resource used for casting spells or abilities.

elixir.name: Elixir
elixir.description: A powerful potion that restores both HP and MP, often used in dire situations.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.description: An item that cures poison or other status ailments that affect a character's performance in battle.

ether.name: Ether
ether.description: A special item that restores a character's MP or other resource over time, instead of all at once like a potion.

phoenix_down.name: Phoenix Down
phoenix_down.description: An item that revives a fallen character with a small amount of HP, allowing them to rejoin the battle.

invisibility_potion.name: Potion of Invisibility
invisibility_potion.description: An item that makes a character invisible for a period of time, allowing them to avoid enemy encounters or sneak past obstacles.

fireball_scroll.name: Scroll of Fireball
fireball_scroll.description: A one-time use item that casts a powerful fireball spell, dealing heavy damage to enemies in an area of effect.

grappling_hook.name: Grappling Hook
grappling_hook.description: An item that can be used to climb walls or reach high places, allowing characters to access new areas or shortcuts.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.description: An item that allows characters to open locked doors or chests, potentially revealing valuable treasure or secrets.
